post.text: The Clinton's are the real predators...

comment.author: Henry
comment.text: I hope the Donald does not flip flop on Immigration I was voting for you because you said you would secure our borders and deport. stick by your word your where you are right now because we Americans wanted that to happen stop illegal immigration and all the freebies they receive don't double down now.

replies.author: Jenay
replies.text: Henry Mr. Trump is not getting soft on immigration. Mr. Trump said he wants to secure our borders & Mr. Trump wants to Build a Wall on the southern border to keep illegals out of the US & Mr. Trump wants to stop the flow of illegal drugs from pouring into the US. Mr. Trump said he wants to get rid of Sanctuary Cities. I watched Mr. Trump do an interview on CNN with Anderson Cooper and Mr. Trump said he is going to deport all Illegals that have committed crimes & are a danger to our country & Mr. Trump said he is open to having the rest deported first & then if they want to come back to the US they will have to come in Legally. Mr. Trump also mentioned the illegals paying back taxes. I believe Mr. Trump is going to be tough on Immigration. Mr. Trump said he is going to make a speech in a few weeks on the complete details of his immigration plan. I have supported Mr. Trump since the start & I still support him. Henry I hope you will continue to support Mr. Trump as well!

replies.author: Bailey
replies.text: Already done even Limbaugh was laughing on his show today how Trump has gotten his rabid supporters to support amnesty, u can't make this stuff up lied to, played, hoodwinked yet again #NeverTrump

replies.author: Charlotte
replies.text: Yup, no more deporting 11 million illegals (couldn't be done anyway), now it's only the criminals. So a campaign promise he's been blabbing about for over a year, now...poof. Typical flop flop Trump BS.
